alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:09PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pima and western Santa Cruz Counties through 500 PM MST... At 408 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Rio Rico, or 14 miles west of Nogales, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tubac, Arivaca, Tumacacori, Amado, Newfield, Sasabe, Pena Blanca Lake, Arivaca Lake, Ruby and Arivaca Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 19 between mile markers 11 and 33. Route 286 between mile markers 1 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales
